name: Belladonna
description: Belladonna is a mostly sativa strain that also carries good indica characteristics making for a very nice hybrid.  A faster flowering time than typical sativa strains makes Belladonna a favorite among growers.  With a fruity smell and a trippy high Paradise Seeds has bred a winner.
descriptionPlain: Belladonna is a mostly sativa strain that also carries good indica characteristics making for a very nice hybrid.  A faster flowering time than typical sativa strains makes Belladonna a favorite among growers.  With a fruity smell and a trippy high Paradise Seeds has bred a winner.

highlightedReviews.text: belladonna was a great bud.  only smoked it once but i remember when picking it up, the nugs were beautiful with a nice smell.  the smoke was very smooth, when i smoke i usually have a few coughing fits but i did not cough one time with this very light and tasty smoke.  the smoke wasn't tast as in being sweet, but it had a smooth, herbal taste to it.  the high was great.  it wasn't the most potent bud ive smoked, it actually took 3 nice sized bowls between my 3 friends and i before i started even getting a buzz.  but after i got that buzz we shared one more bowl and i felt the very light, euphoric high.  at first i got kind of energetic, kind of like a sativa high.  but about an hour later i sat down on the couch and was just glued there for about another two hours until i eventually went to bed.  would highly recommend for a high not when you want to get blazed out of your mind, but have a nice attitude then chill out.  one of my favorite all time buds.

Belladonna my dear!
You were so good last night, a beautiful combination of body relaxation and nice, consistent mind stimulation makes you perfect to enjoy any time of day. Your earthy buttery smell and outstanding orange hairs could make even the worst cotton mouth drool.

9/10 Would recommend to a bud.
